name: src/collide-pair-listener.js
src/index.js
content:
import PhaserMatterCollisionPlugin from "./phaser-matter-collision-plugin";

export default PhaserMatterCollisionPlugin;

name: src/logger.js
src/phaser-matter-collision-plugin.js
ObjectWithBody
description: A valid physics-enabled game object, or just an object that has "body" property

name: PhysicsObject
description: A valid physics-enabled game object, or a native Matter body

name: collisionstart
description:
This event proxies the Matter collisionstart event, which is fired when any bodies have started
colliding.

properties.name: event
properties.description:
The Matter event data, with the "pairs" property modified so that each
pair now has a gameObjectA and a gameObjectB property. Those properties will contain the game
object associated with the native bodyA or bodyB (or undefined if no game object exists).

name: collisionend
description:
This event proxies the Matter collisionend event, which is fired when any bodies have stopped
colliding.

properties.name: event
properties.description:
The Matter event data, with the "pairs" property modified so that each
pair now has a gameObjectA and a gameObjectB property. Those properties will contain the game
object associated with the native bodyA or bodyB (or undefined if no game object exists).

name: collisionactive
description:
This event proxies the Matter collisionactive event, which is fired when any bodies are still
colliding (after the tick of the engine where they started colliding).

properties.name: event
properties.description:
The Matter event data, with the "pairs" property modified so that each
pair now has a gameObjectA and a gameObjectB property. Those properties will contain the game
object associated with the native bodyA or bodyB (or undefined if no game object exists).

name: paircollisionstart
description: This event is fired for each pair of bodies that collide during Matter's collisionstart.

properties.name: event.bodyA
properties.description: The native Matter bodyA from the pair

properties.name: event.bodyB
properties.description: The native Matter bodyB from the pair

properties.name: event.gameObjectA
properties.description: The game object associated with bodyA, if it exists

properties.name: event.gameObjectB
properties.description: The game object associated with bodyB, if it exists

properties.name: event.pair
properties.description: The original pair data from Matter

name: paircollisionend
description: This event is fired for each pair of bodies that collide during Matter's collisionend.

params.name: event.bodyA
params.description: The native Matter bodyA from the pair

params.name: event.bodyB
params.description: The native Matter bodyB from the pair

params.name: event.gameObjectA
params.description: The game object associated with bodyA, if it exists

params.name: event.gameObjectB
params.description: The game object associated with bodyB, if it exists

params.name: event.pair
params.description: The original pair data from Matter

name: paircollisionactive
description: This event is fired for each pair of bodies that collide during Matter's collisionactive.

params.name: event.bodyA
params.description: The native Matter bodyA from the pair

params.name: event.bodyB
params.description: The native Matter bodyB from the pair

params.name: event.gameObjectA
params.description: The game object associated with bodyA, if it exists

params.name: event.gameObjectB
params.description: The game object associated with bodyB, if it exists

params.name: event.pair
params.description: The original pair data from Matter

name: constructor
description: Creates an instance of MatterCollisionPlugin.

name: addOnCollideStart
description:
Add a listener for collidestart events between objectA and objectB. The collidestart event is
fired by Matter when two bodies start colliding within a tick of the engine. If objectB is
omitted, any collisions with objectA will be passed along to the listener. See
{@link paircollisionstart} for information on callback parameters.

unknown.tagValue:
{function} A function that can be invoked to unsubscribe the listener that was just
added.

params.name: options.objectA
params.description:
The first object to watch for in
colliding pairs.

params.name: options.objectB
params.description:
Optional, the second object to watch
for in colliding pairs. If not defined, all collisions with objectA will trigger the callback

params.name: options.callback
params.description: The function to be invoked on collision

params.name: options.context
params.description: The context to apply when invoking the callback.

return.description:
A function that can be invoked to unsubscribe the listener that was just
added.

name: addOnCollideEnd
description: This method mirrors {@link MatterCollisionPlugin#addOnCollideStart}

name: addOnCollideActive
description: This method mirrors {@link MatterCollisionPlugin#addOnCollideStart}

name: removeOnCollideStart
description:
Remove any listeners that were added with addOnCollideStart that match the given options object
parameter exactly. I.e. this will only remove the listener if the listener was added via
addOnCollideStart with the same parameters.

unknown.tagValue:
{function} A function that can be invoked to unsubscribe the listener that was just
added.

params.name: options.objectA
params.description:
The first object to watch for in
colliding pairs.

params.name: options.objectB
params.description:
the second object to watch for in
colliding pairs. If not defined, all collisions with objectA will trigger the callback

params.name: options.callback
params.description: The function to be invoked on collision

params.name: options.context
params.description: The context to apply when invoking the callback.

return.description:
A function that can be invoked to unsubscribe the listener that was just
added.

name: removeOnCollideEnd
description: This method mirrors {@link MatterCollisionPlugin#removeOnCollideStart}

name: removeOnCollideActive
description: This method mirrors {@link MatterCollisionPlugin#removeOnCollideStart}

name: removeAllCollideStartListeners
description: Remove any listeners that were added with addOnCollideStart.

name: removeAllCollideActiveListeners
description: Remove any listeners that were added with addOnCollideActive.

name: removeAllCollideEndListeners
description: Remove any listeners that were added with addOnCollideEnd.

name: removeAllCollideListeners
description:
Remove any listeners that were added with addOnCollideStart, addOnCollideActive or
addOnCollideEnd.

name: removeCollideStartListenersOf
description: Remove addOnCollideStart listeners where the given object(s) was involved.

params.name: object
params.description: An object or array of objects

name: removeCollideActiveListenersOf
description: Remove addOnCollideActive listeners where the given object(s) was involved.

params.name: object
params.description: An object or array of objects

name: removeCollideEndListenersOf
description: Remove addOnCollideEnd listeners where the given object(s) was involved.

params.name: object
params.description: An object or array of objects

name: removeAllCollideListenersOf
description:
Remove addOnCollideStart, addOnCollideActive & addOnCollideEnd listeners where the given
object(s) was involved.

params.name: object
params.description: An object or array of objects

name: onCollisionEvent
description: Reusable handler for collisionstart, collisionend, collisionactive.

name: src/utils.js
getRootBody
description: Get the root body of a compound Matter body

name: isMatterBody
description: Duck type to check if the given object is a Matter body (because there isn't a prototype)

name: isPhysicsObject
description:
Check if object is an acceptable physical object for this plugin - a Matter Body, a tile, or an
object with a body property

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "phaser-matter-collision-plugin",
  "version": "0.9.0",
  "description": "A plugin for making it easier to manage collisions with Phaser + Matter.js",
  "main": "dist/phaser-matter-collision-plugin.min.js",
  "files": [
    "src/!(mocks|tests)",
    "dist"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "build:library": "webpack --mode production --config config/webpack.config.js",
    "build:tests": "webpack --mode development --config config/webpack.test.config.js",
    "watch:library": "webpack --mode development --config config/webpack.config.js --watch",
    "watch:tests": "webpack --mode development --config config/webpack.test.config.js --watch",
    "serve": "browser-sync start --server \".\" --directory --watch --startPath \"/tests\"",
    "dev": "concurrently \"npm run watch:tests\" \"npm run watch:library\" \"npm run serve\"",
    "dev:cypress": "concurrently \"npm run watch:tests\" \"npm run watch:library\" \"cypress open\"",
    "test:jest": "jest --config=./config/jest.config.js",
    "pretest:cypress": "npm run build:tests",
    "test:cypress": "cypress run",
    "doc": "esdoc -c ./config/esdoc.json",
    "predeploy:doc": "npm run doc",
    "deploy:doc": "gh-pages --branch gh-pages --dist ./docs/build --dest docs",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm run build:library",
    "pull-types": "curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/photonstorm/phaser3-docs/master/typescript/phaser.d.ts --create-dirs --location --output ./types/phaser.d.ts"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/mikewesthad/phaser-matter-collision-plugin.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "matter.js",
    "phaser",
    "collision detection",
    "game engine",
    "physics engine"
  ],
  "author": "Michael Hadley",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/mikewesthad/phaser-matter-collision-plugin/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/mikewesthad/phaser-matter-collision-plugin#readme",
  "peerDependencies": {
    "phaser": "^3.11.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.3",
    "babel-jest": "^23.4.2",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.5",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "browser-sync": "^2.24.6",
    "concurrently": "^3.6.1",
    "cypress": "^3.0.3",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-inject-style-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.3.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^2.9.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^2.6.2",
    "eventemitter3": "^3.1.0",
    "gh-pages": "^1.2.0",
    "jest": "^23.5.0",
    "phaser": "^3.12.0-beta2",
    "prettier": "^1.14.2",
    "regenerator-runtime": "^0.12.1",
    "uglifyjs-webpack-plugin": "^1.2.7",
    "webpack": "^4.16.5",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.1.0"
  },
  "prettier": {
    "printWidth": 100
  }
}

README.md
